Sentencas: Recently, metal-based solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) receive much attention for potential application in auxiliary power units (APUs).
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: In this study, a sinter-joining method with a silver bonding layer is proposed.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: This method enables the fabrication of metal-based SOFCs by joining metal plates and conventional ceramic cells using a silver bonding layer.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: This sinter-joining method has the advantage of full-sintering of the cathode at 1100 degrees C, which facilitates a lower area specific resistance (ASR) of the cathode.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, the entire manufacturing process is conducted under air atmosphere.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: A 5 x 5 cm(2) metal-based cell is successfully fabricated by the sinter-joining method, and a maximum power density of 433 mW cm(-2) and a low polarization resistance of 0.12 Omega cm(2) is obtained.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: Using the metal-based cells, a prototype 3-cell SOFC stack is developed considering mechanical robustness and diesel reformate fuel supply for future APU system applications.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: The stack exhibits a maximum power density of 100 mW cm(-2) and is tested for 120 h. After the test, a post-mortem analysis is conducted, and the causes of the low electrochemical performance and degradation issue are investigated.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications

Sentencas: In the conclusion, the sinter-joining method is considered as one of the methods for metal-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Development and evaluation of a 3-cell stack of metal-based solid oxide fuel cells fabricated via a sinter-joining method for auxiliary power unit applications
